Articles.Content:
i was just curious about how well people have been able to preform speed wise, since distance isnt really a factor, you can just drift indefinitely.

here is my top speed with the alpha parts available.

Some numbers in this thread: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=407.0

It's a bit outdated though, I consider myself the current record holder with this ship: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=962.0
